27 March.name: Photography Talk
27 March.description: Maake your stps in a stealthy way.... wait patiently for the right moment... CAPTURE ! It is not so easy to be wildlife photographer. Come, join us on a talk on photographer by Ms. Rathika Ramasamy to know the wax and wane of being a wildlife photographer. Never Miss out !
